front.title: Allen Institute for AI
front.subtitle: U.S. research institute for computer science

back.text: The Allen Institute for AI is a 501(c)(3) non-profit scientific research institute founded by late Microsoft co-founder and philanthropist Paul Allen in 2014. The institute seeks to conduct high-impact AI research and engineering in service of the common good. Ai2 is based in Seattle, and also has an active office in Tel Aviv, Israel.
